text: Villers-sous-Montrond was a commune in the Doubs department in the Bourgogne- Franche-Comté region in eastern France. On 1 January 2022, it became part of a new commune, Les Monts-Ronds.Arrêté préfectoral, p. 39, 22 December 2021 ==References== Category:Former communes in Doubs
title: Villers-sous-Montrond
